item.description:
Several members of our group invite you to pick up where we left off last year in developing the Portland Tool Library concept and seeing what it would take to make a reality.

Several other cities and towns around North America have successfully launched lending libraries for many commonly (and uncommonly!) used tools so that we don't all have to own everything or be stuck when a project comes up.  There are many models for doing this that can be discussed and some initial resources can go a long way.

Read more about tool libraries here and come prepared to roll up your sleeves and help make something happen!

Resources for starting a tool library.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: A Lending Tool Library for Portland - Organizing Meeting
